# Puja-In-Pune-Marathi — 1979-02-25

## Videos

- `Mahashivaratri-Puja/`

## Files (per video subdirectory)

### Source (read-only)
- `{video_slug}/source/en.srt` — English original SRT
- `{video_slug}/source/uk.srt` — Original Ukrainian translation (DO NOT edit)
- `{video_slug}/source/whisper.json` — Whisper speech detection data

### Working
- `{video_slug}/work/uk_corrected.srt` — **Main working copy** (edit this file)

### Final (auto-generated)
- `{video_slug}/final/uk.srt` — Optimized SRT (generated by optimizer)
- `{video_slug}/final/uk.txt` — Plain text transcript
- `{video_slug}/final/report.txt` — Optimization report

### Talk-level
- `meta.yaml` — Talk metadata (title, date, videos list)
- `CLAUDE.md` — This file

## Workflow

1. Edit `{video_slug}/work/uk_corrected.srt` — apply translations and corrections
2. Push to GitHub — optimizer runs automatically
3. Review `{video_slug}/final/report.txt` for quality metrics
4. Repeat for each video subdirectory

## Optimization Parameters

| Parameter | Target | Hard Limit |
|-----------|--------|------------|
| CPS | <=15 | <=20 |
| Lines per block | 1 | 1 |
| Min duration | >=1.2s | >=1.0s |
| Max duration | <=7s | <=8s |
| Min gap | >=80ms | >=80ms |

## Language Rules

### Deity Pronoun Capitalization
- **Shri Mataji**: ALWAYS uppercase (Я/Мені/Мій/Моя/Вона/Її/Їй)
- **Individual Incarnations** singular: uppercase (Він/Його/Йому)
- **Incarnations plural** mid-sentence: lowercase (вони/їм/їх)
- **Regular people**: always lowercase

### Ukrainian Orthography
- Reflexive verbs: `-ся` not `-сь`
- Quotation marks: `<<>>` (yalynky)
- Em-dash: ` -- ` with spaces
- Ellipsis: `...` without space before

## Review Process

Use the 5-agent language review:
- A: Orthography
- B: Punctuation
- C: Grammar
- D: Capitalization
- E: Consistency (informational only)
